heading: Today
text: Clouds and a few snow showers north, maybe a little sun.  Becoming partly sunny south.

heading: Friday Night
text: Any flurries giving way to some clearing north. Partly cloudy south.

heading: Saturday
text: Partly sunny, then clouds. Some late-day rain or snow in New York.
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Sunday
text: A wintry mix changing to rain and snow.
temperature: Low to mid 40s, with 30s northeast, and upper 40s far south
